bibl.title: Polish Archaeology in the Mediterranean. XIII. Reports 2001.
bibl.note: Rapports d'activités en Égypte (Alexandrie, Maréa, Marina el-Alamein, Tell el-Farkha, Saqqara, Naqlun, Deir el-Bahari), au Soudan, à Chypre, au Liban et en Syrie.
Polish Archaeology in the Mediterranean. XIII. Reports 2001.
Warsaw, University of Warsaw, Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology, 2002, 8°, 309 pp., figg., plans.
